name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creator Match: Grow & Monetize on LinkedIn BETA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. Supercharge your LinkedIn presence with Creator Match.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creator Match: Grow & Monetize on LinkedIn

Supercharge your LinkedIn presence with Creator Match, the tool to grow and monetize on LinkedIn. 

Creator Match is the ONLY tool that allows you to discover which LinkedIn Creators are running brand sponsorships, access detailed post performance analytics (organic & sponsored), monitor competitor sponsorships, track creator stats, analyze content by format and engagement type, view posting schedules, filter/sort posts to refine your strategy, and so much more.

This is a MUST for LinkedIn Creators, Brands, & Agencies

Which is why we made it 100% FREE :)

âœ“ Access Detailed Analytics: Gain insights into both your OWN analytics as well as the billions of users (both Individual and Company LinkedIn Profiles), including top-performing sponsored & organic posts such as average and total post analytics, engagement rate, post formats, posting frequency, and more.

âœ“ Discover Sponsored Content: Identify which LinkedIn Creators are running brand sponsorships, what brand they were sponsored by, the links to the sponsored posts, and the performance of those posts.

âœ“ Source Creators: Find the best Creators for your brand sponsorships and de-risk your campaign by leveraging detailed insights into past performance metrics.

âœ“ Utilize Advanced Filtering, Sorting, and Search: Dive deep into specific posts by format (text, carousel, image, video), date, time, type (organic vs. sponsored), and engagement type to tailor your content strategy.

âœ“ Analyze Competitors: See which Creators your Brand competitors are sponsoring and assess the success of their campaigns.
